correctness.description: The accuracy of the answer provided by the agent.

completeness.description: The degree to which the final solution covers all aspects of the question.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the agent's logic and reasoning process.

steps_efficiency.description: The number of steps the agent takes to arrive at a conclusion relative to the task's complexity.

diversity_of_approach.description: The range and variety of methods and perspectives the agent uses to solve the question.

result_replicability.description: The ease with which the result can be duplicated by running the same or similar steps.

explanation_clarity.description: The clarity of the agent's explanation and the ease of understanding for a human.

robustness.description: The agent's ability to handle various inputs and unexpected situations during the task.

accepted_values.description: Robustness of solution to different scenarios

innovativeness.description: The novelty and creativity of the solutions provided by the agent.

data_contamination_avoidance.description: The extent to which the agent avoids using contaminated or biased data in producing the solution.
